title: Mantuban's Legacy
content:
Talk to Torrelli in Gnome Dwelling.


 * 29 Miner
 * 35 Blacksmith


 * Start the quest by talking to Thaddeus Torrelli in Gnome Dwelling.




 * 24,900 Blacksmith experience
 * 22,200 Miner experience
 * 24,900 Minefighter experience
 * Ability to do ventures every 12 hours that give a mining experience drop and explosive materials usable west of venture.
